errors.formattedMessage:

Counterexample:
arr = []
a = 0x0
x = 1

Transaction trace:
test.constructor()
State: arr = []
test.f(0x0, 2)
 --> A:9:7:

9 | 						x + type(uint).max;
  | 						^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
